content: star pendent beaded necklace crochet pattern by sara sach thank you for purchasing a posh pooch designs dog clothes original pattern i have done my best to keep my patterns simple and easy to understand if at any time you need assistance please feel free to contact me at the email below please remember that there may be a slight variance in sizing due to different tensions of each individual and materials used all patterns are copyright protected whether free or paid this includes all photography you are welcome to sell finished products made from my patterns i do ask however that you mention my company name i would love to see your finished products if you would like to send me pictures these will be for my personal use only and will not be posted anywhere without prior written permission from you enjoy sara sach ssach@poshpoochdesigns com 1 star pendent beaded necklace crochet pattern skill easy materials crochet hook h / 5 mm yarn- any med 4 weight any fiber 1 oz 21 pony bead and size that fits your yarn yarn needle stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet pico stitch pcst size star pendent - 2 5 inches necklace - 26 inches around notes have fun 2 pattern star pendent r 1- thread the needle leaving yarn attached to the ball / skein slide on 5 beads of choice tie yarn in a circle leaving a 5-6 inch yarn tail needed for the last bead pull yarn up ch1 single_crochet between the 1st 2 beads stitching around the yarn ring chain 2 *single_crochet between the next t 2 beads stitching around the yarn ring chain 2* repeat from * to * 3 more times join to the 1st single_crochet slip_stitch in the ch2 space 5 sets of single_crochet ch2 3 r 2 single_crochet double_crochet pcst double_crochet single_crochet in each of the ch2 sps join to the 1st single_crochet tie off using the beginning tail of yarn and needle thread on 1 bead stitch the bead to the center of the star weave in to the back tie off the ends beaded necklace with any yarn of your choosing and needle slide on the 16 beads ch10 sliding the beads forward as we crochet *slide 1 bead to the crochet hook chain 5* repeat from * to * 6 more times 4 ch2 slip_stitch through one of the points of the st ch2 remember the slide the unused beads forward till needed repeat from * to * 8 more times chain 10 tie off tie both ends of the chain than tie them together 5
